Uses of Interface
opennlp.tools.util.InputStreamFactory

Packages that use InputStreamFactory
Package
Description
opennlp.tools.formats
Experimental package related to converting various corpora to OpenNLP Format.
opennlp.tools.formats.ad
Experimental package related to the Arvores Deitadas corpus format.
opennlp.tools.formats.conllu
Experimental package related to the CoNNL-U format.
opennlp.tools.util
Package containing utility data structures and algorithms used by multiple other packages.
